/*!************************************************
* Blogger Template Style
* Name: Essential
**************************************************/
body{
overflow-wrap:break-word;
word-break:break-word;
word-wrap:break-word
}
.hidden{
display:none
}
.invisible{
visibility:hidden
}
.container:after,.float-container:after{
clear:both;
content:"";
display:table
}
.clearboth{
clear:both
}
#comments .comment .comment-actions,.subscribe-popup .FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-submit,.widget.Profile .profile-link,.widget.Profile .profile-link.visit-profile{
background:transparent;
border:0;
box-shadow:none;
color:#2196f3;
cursor:pointer;
font-size:14px;
font-weight:700;
outline:none;
text-decoration:none;
text-transform:uppercase;
width:auto
}
.dim-overlay{
height:100vh;
left:0;
position:fixed;
top:0;
width:100%
}
#sharing-dim-overlay{
background-color:transparent
}
input::-ms-clear{
display:none
}
.blogger-logo,.svg-icon-24.blogger-logo{
fill:#ff9800;
opacity:1
}
.loading-spinner-large{
-webkit-animation:mspin-rotate 1568.63ms linear infinite;
animation:mspin-rotate 1568.63ms linear infinite;
height:48px;
overflow:hidden;
position:absolute;
width:48px;
z-index:200
}
.loading-spinner-large>div{
-webkit-animation:mspin-revrot 5332ms steps(4) infinite;
animation:mspin-revrot 5332ms steps(4) infinite
}
.loading-spinner-large>div>div{
-webkit-animation:mspin-singlecolor-large-film 1333ms steps(81) infinite;
animation:mspin-singlecolor-large-film 1333ms steps(81) infinite;
background-size:100%;
height:48px;
width:3888px
}
.mspin-black-large>div>div,.mspin-grey_54-large>div>div{
background-image:url(https://www.blogblog.com/indie/mspin_black_large.svg)
}
.mspin-white-large>div>div{
background-image:url(https://www.blogblog.com/indie/mspin_white_large.svg)
}
.mspin-grey_54-large{
opacity:.54
}
@-webkit-keyframes mspin-singlecolor-large-film{
0%{
-webkit-transform:translateX(0);
transform:translateX(0)
}
to{
-webkit-transform:translateX(-3888px);
transform:translateX(-3888px)
}
}
@keyframes mspin-singlecolor-large-film{
0%{
-webkit-transform:translateX(0);
transform:translateX(0)
}
to{
-webkit-transform:translateX(-3888px);
transform:translateX(-3888px)
}
}
@-webkit-keyframes mspin-rotate{
0%{
-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
transform:rotate(0deg)
}
to{
-webkit-transform:rotate(1turn);
transform:rotate(1turn)
}
}
@keyframes mspin-rotate{
0%{
-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
transform:rotate(0deg)
}
to{
-webkit-transform:rotate(1turn);
transform:rotate(1turn)
}
}
@-webkit-keyframes mspin-revrot{
0%{
-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
transform:rotate(0deg)
}
to{
-webkit-transform:rotate(-1turn);
transform:rotate(-1turn)
}
}
@keyframes mspin-revrot{
0%{
-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
transform:rotate(0deg)
}
to{
-webkit-transform:rotate(-1turn);
transform:rotate(-1turn)
}
}
.skip-navigation{
background-color:#fff;
box-sizing:border-box;
color:#000;
display:block;
height:0;
left:0;
line-height:50px;
overflow:hidden;
padding-top:0;
position:fixed;
text-align:center;
top:0;
-webkit-transition:box-shadow .3s,height .3s,padding-top .3s;
transition:box-shadow .3s,height .3s,padding-top .3s;
width:100%;
z-index:900
}
.skip-navigation:focus{
box-shadow:0 4px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.2);
height:50px
}
#main{
outline:none
}
.main-heading{
position:absolute;
clip:rect(1px,1px,1px,1px);
padding:0;
border:0;
height:1px;
width:1px;
overflow:hidden
}
.Attribution{

}
.Attribution .blogger img,.Attribution .blogger svg{
vertical-align:bottom
}
.Attribution .blogger img{

}
.Attribution div{

}
.Attribution .copyright,.Attribution .image-attribution{

}
.BLOG_mobile_video_class{

}
.bg-photo{

}
body .CSS_LIGHTBOX{

}
.extendable .show-less,.extendable .show-more{

}

}

}
.post-body iframe,.post-body img{

}
.post-body a[imageanchor=\31]{

}
.byline{

}
.byline:last-child{

}

}
.link-copied-dialog .modal-dialog-buttons{

}

}

.paging-control-container .comment-range-text,.paging-control-container .paging-control{

.byline.reactions iframe{

}

  <div class="container">

    <h1>Sustainability Goal Tracker</h1>

    <!-- Pre-Onboarding Section -->

    <div class="feature">

      <h2>Pre-Onboarding</h2>

      <p>A retail company selects <strong>"Reduce Scope 2 emissions"</strong> as its goal.</p>

      <div class="interactive">

        <label for="goal-select">Select Your Goal:</label>

        <select id="goal-select">

          <option value="scope2">Reduce Scope 2 Emissions</option>

          <option value="scope1">Reduce Scope 1 Emissions</option>

          <option value="scope3">Reduce Scope 3 Emissions</option>

        </select>

      </div>

    </div>

    <!-- Guided Workflow Section -->

    <div class="feature">

      <h2>Guided Workflow</h2>

      <p>AI skips manufacturing-specific questions and focuses on <strong>electricity usage, HVAC systems, and supplier networks</strong>.</p>

      <p>Chatbot explains how to calculate emissions from their store lighting.</p>

      <div class="interactive">

        <p><strong>Chatbot:</strong> "To calculate emissions from store lighting, provide your monthly kWh usage or upload an energy bill."</p>

      </div>

    </div>

    <!-- Dynamic Adjustment Section -->

    <div class="feature">

      <h2>Dynamic Adjustment</h2>

      <p>User uploads an energy bill; AI auto-fills kWh usage and flags a <strong>25% spike</strong> compared to similar-sized retailers.</p>

      <div class="interactive">

        <label for="energy-bill">Upload Energy Bill:</label>

        <input type="file" id="energy-bill" accept=".pdf,.jpg,.png">

        <button onclick="processBill()">Process Bill</button>

        <p id="bill-result"></p>

      </div>

    </div>

    <!-- Post-Onboarding Section -->

    <div class="feature">

      <h2>Post-Onboarding</h2>

      <p>The dashboard pre-loads a <strong>"Switch to LED Lighting"</strong> recommendation with ROI estimates.</p>

      <div class="interactive">

        <p><strong>Dashboard Recommendation:</strong> "Switch to LED Lighting - Estimated ROI: 2 years, Cost Savings: $10,000 annually."</p>

      </div>

    </div>

  </div>

  <script>

    function processBill() {

      // Simulate processing the bill

      document.getElementById('bill-result').innerHTML = 

        "Bill processed! AI detected a 25% spike in kWh usage compared to similar-sized retailers.";

    }

  </script>

<h3 class="post-title"><a href="https://cfp0.blogspot.com/2025/02/analyzing-carbon-emissions-through-lens.html">Analyzing Carbon Emissions Through the Lens of Autosmallsatellites</a></h3>
<div class="post-header">
<div class="post-header-line-1">
</div>
</div>
<div class="item-content float-container">
<div class="item-thumbnail">
<a href="https://cfp0.blogspot.com/2025/02/analyzing-carbon-emissions-through-lens.html">
<img alt="Image" sizes="72px" src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgqTqOpRtqxpssPwl6fvwnsldaHPv1TRVnrvpfkzc7gzv082zUhOToTwZbP3HiE1aALfNVe30uhMn_KRRUaBdOxSlul4eHNRycXUk20VkECaGuLSyG6i-C5o7mARX_-l8R6xmqptcAKnMvydVN3iprU1UZd7nAl3uEGjuX0AGC4WAo11ofYk7Q2LcG26Q/w400-h239/1000074007.png" srcset="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgqTqOpRtqxpssPwl6fvwnsldaHPv1TRVnrvpfkzc7gzv082zUhOToTwZbP3HiE1aALfNVe30uhMn_KRRUaBdOxSlul4eHNRycXUk20VkECaGuLSyG6i-C5o7mARX_-l8R6xmqptcAKnMvydVN3iprU1UZd7nAl3uEGjuX0AGC4WAo11ofYk7Q2LcG26Q/w72-h72-p-k-no-nu/1000074007.png 72w, https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgqTqOpRtqxpssPwl6fvwnsldaHPv1TRVnrvpfkzc7gzv082zUhOToTwZbP3HiE1aALfNVe30uhMn_KRRUaBdOxSlul4eHNRycXUk20VkECaGuLSyG6i-C5o7mARX_-l8R6xmqptcAKnMvydVN3iprU1UZd7nAl3uEGjuX0AGC4WAo11ofYk7Q2LcG26Q/w144-h144-p-k-no-nu/1000074007.png 144w">
</a>
</div>
<div class="popular-posts-snippet snippet-container r-snippet-container">
<div class="snippet-item r-snippetized">
Recent advancements in satellite technology, particularly autonomous small satellites (Autosmallsatellites), have revolutionized how we monitor and analyze carbon emissions. These compact, agile sensors provide granular data, enabling organizations to break down emissions across sectors and hold corporations accountable. AutoGuided onboarding WebApp for Carbon Footprint Reduction.

Onboarding Flow

  • Other Apps

Sustainability Goal Tracker

Pre-Onboarding

A retail company selects "Reduce Scope 2 emissions" as its goal.

Guided Workflow

AI skips manufacturing-specific questions and focuses on electricity usage, HVAC systems, and supplier networks.

Chatbot explains how to calculate emissions from their store lighting.

Chatbot: "To calculate emissions from store lighting, provide your monthly kWh usage or upload an energy bill."

Dynamic Adjustment

User uploads an energy bill; AI auto-fills kWh usage and flags a 25% spike compared to similar-sized retailers.

Post-Onboarding

The dashboard pre-loads a "Switch to LED Lighting" recommendation with ROI estimates.

Dashboard Recommendation: "Switch to LED Lighting - Estimated ROI: 2 years, Cost Savings: $10,000 annually."
